7.23.18  9:35 pm   Does the day go on like a Higgs Boson?

     i never thought about it that way but yes that's exactly right

7.23.18  8:33 pm   When I try to say what I mean, I realize I didn't mean it that way at  all. It's like a curse. Can it be broken?

     yes, you are going to want to be a bit more lucid and liquid with the flow of time

     when something other than a joke is funny

7.23.18  7:08 pm   what does god intend?

     ogd, dgo, and more

7.23.18  6:59 pm   who decided that macaroni with cheese is called "macaroni cheese"

     i've never heard it called that

      rather than "cheesy macaroni"? furthermore is it fundamentally immoral to eat macaroni without any cheese at all?

     no, but a little fun history about macaroni, it was fundamentally immoral for macaroni to exist in the first place. that's part of the thrill ride that continues to this day

     what if you combine the two some how

7.23.18  5:31 pm   is the new song gonna be intentionally really bad

      no, it's going to be intentionally good, which i'm afraid may actually cause problems

7.23.18  5:08 pm   7.21.18  1:14 pm is it not because it's a power of two? I mean, 2 is arguably much more "powerful" and "magic" and 1 is pretty special, in the other direction 8 is a bit less "powerful and magic" than 4, 16 is a bit less, 32, 64, etc.

on a semirelated note, what do you think of so-called 'irrational time signatures' where the 'denominator' is not a power of two?  like 7/12 (which would denote a bar of 7 eighth-note triplets, because a whole note divided into 12 equal segments is eighth-note triplets) useful notation tool or pretentious bullshit?

      i think in the case you referenced, most of the things they mentioned seemed to get their power from the lowness of the number. like less than 10

7.23.18  5:04 pm   I'm having a daughter in October what should I name her. my husband likes olive but I don't like that name

     mushroom?

7.23.18  4:57 pm   When I play guitar I usually just get the guitar in tune with itself as opposed to actually tuning to standard pitch, or if I play with a friend we usually just tune our instruments to match eachother. Is this a bad habit? Should I be tuning to standard pitch every time? 

     it depends how compatible you want your music to be with any music outside this room

     the perfect wedding gift

     because you have something better in mind....

     i am sports

     nobody enjoys seltzer water

7.23.18  12:09 pm   Regarding your uniqueness formula... In mathematics, a uniqueness theorem is a theorem proving that certain conditions determine a unique solution. Examples of uniqueness theorems include: Eating a head of lettuce. So what's the formula, in terms of heads of lettuce?

     spread out the lettuce, end to end. you've seen wall to wall carpeting, well this is like that except with lettuce. pretty cool

7.23.18  11:51 am   What do you think of transgender people

     what i think of a person has nothing to do with if they are transgender. i might not even know

     i'd say about a 12.7

     you could win

     i have a delivery window where people deliver hot fresh memes all year round

     what exactly do you need help with

     as soon as humanly possible

7.23.18  8:51 am   Your opinion on yourself?

     they are a sign of niceness, and friendship

     it means this song writing thing is turning out to be even more than i thought

     i don't understand the difference

     you

     in

7.22.18  10:03 pm   are you embarrassed that you stole bill clinton's first name?

7.22.18  9:36 pm   So I get when talking about a full scale you want to use all the letter names for the notes (like C# you'd say is C# D# E# F# etc)... But if I were to ask you what the 3rd of C# major is, would you still actually say E# instead of F? Like if you were playing in a band and there was a song in C#maj and the guitar player or sax player or whoever asked you "hey, what note should I play here?" Would you ever respond by saying "E sharp"? 

     in regular conversation you can use what i call the "reasonability rule" which in this case would be to call it F

      I thought maybe it was the 41st song on the song page, but it looks like it's 37.

     i would have had no idea which songs were going to be on the songs page at that time
